snippet: Uruguay moved a step closer to becoming the first country to legalize marijuana, with lawmakers introducing a bill that outlines how the drug would be produced, sold and regulated.
abstract: Uruguay moves step closer to becoming first country to legalize marijuana, with lawmakers introducing bill that outlines how drug would be produced, sold and regulated.
lead_paragraph: Uruguay moved a step closer to becoming the first country to legalize marijuana, with lawmakers introducing a bill that outlines how the drug would be produced, sold and regulated.
